name: Agnar
stat_block:

The all-eater, or 'supermouth,' of Kath. This jungle-dwelling beast has an odd spherical body/head lined on all sides with chomping teeth. Ravenously hungry at all times. Terrified and enraged by fire in any form.

name: Angel
stat_block:
**HP:** Variable
**Rolls:** +6 STATS, +4 EFFORT
**Actions:**
- **Sun Sword:** ULTIMATE weapon ignores ARMOR, strikes all CLOSE enemies. Natural 12s explode
- **Sun Fury:** Ray of pure nuclear fire, functions like the sword but with 1 mile range
- **Radiant Nova:** Glows bright as a white star. Demons, undead, infernals and evil-doers must roll CHA or flee for 1D4 TURNS
- **Judgement:** Chooses a single creature. In 1D4 TURNS, it is torn apart atom by atom

Indestructible servants of infinity. Absolute, indisputable LAWGIVERS of the multiverse.

name: Avenger
stat_block:
**HP:** 5 Hearts (50 HP)
**Rolls:** +5 STATS, +8 WEAPON EFFORT
**Actions:**
- **Execute:** Axe slices through objects, walls, or creatures CLOSE to the target. Creatures/objects hit reduced to 0 HP
- **Retrieve:** Grapples foe and returns to origin. HARD STR rolls are the only escape
- **Prism Blades:** All creatures within FAR must roll DEX to evade or take ULTIMATE damage
- **Mist Stone:** MAGIC does half damage against them

Prisoners of their purpose. Conjured into existence only to fulfill some grave task, vow, or obey a powerful wizard. Dissipate when task is complete.

name: Ant Men
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Rolls:** +2 ALL ROLLS, 2 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Slash:** Sword attack. Seldom use ranged weapons
- **Dismembering Bite:** WEAPON. If more than 6 damage dealt, the target loses a limb
- **Acid Mist:** Corrosive mist from pores in exoskeleton. All enemies within NEAR roll CON or suffer WEAPON damage to themselves AND 1 piece of equipment

Found anywhere the land is hollow. Live to protect their queen (one per thousand square miles). Work as a team in vast numbers. Primary food source is fungus farmed in deep tunnels.

name: Banshee
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Rolls:** +2 ALL ROLLS

- **Claws:** Spectral Slash, MAGIC

- **Blink:** Move up to FAR distance without traveling the space between
- **Drain (INT Spell):** Drain MAGIC EFFORT of HP from a target to heal itself
- **Spectral Substance:** Only magical weaponry and magic can harm them

Tormented souls, poor wretches driven by confusion and envy of the living. Often found terrorizing a small town where they were betrayed in life.

name: Black Drake
stat_block:
**HP:** 5 Hearts (50 HP)
**Rolls:** +5 ALL ROLLS, 3 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Crushing Bite:** NEAR WEAPON, if victim dropped to 0 HP, devoured
- **Take Wing:** Flies straight up. At altitude, glides 1D4 ROUNDS, recovering full HP
- **Whipping Tail:** All enemies NEAR make DEX Check or take WEAPON damage
- **Breath of Fire:** All enemies within FAR in front roll CON to avoid. DOUBLE ULTIMATE
- **Spell Stealer (INT Spell):** On a Hard Attempt, can utilize any INT spell used by opponents
- **Immune to fire in all forms**

Most sinister of the Drakes. Live to feed on lesser beings, hoard treasure, and dominate volcanic realms, demanding worship from all.

name: Blind Horror
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Rolls:** +5 DEX

- **Spiked Tail:** WEAPON, rolls with DEX, ignores armor (rolls on TARGET rather than DEFENSE)

- **Heal With Flames (WIS Spell):** Heals itself with MAGIC
- **Gather Power:** Use an Action to gather power, doubling any EFFORT on next TURN

Sightless fiends that prowl the pits. Demonic in nature, channel fire energy, hunt with smell and sound. Servants of Devilish masters.

name: Bore Worm
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Rolls:** +3 ALL ROLLS, 2 Actions per Turn

- **Tongue Lash:** WEAPON, can also destroy any inanimate object
- **Stone Bite:** WEAPON, if over 8 EFFORT in one attack, destroy one item on target
- **Venom Scent (INT Spell):** CLOSE enemies roll CON or become dizzy with noxious gas. Causes 3 Poison Damage and makes rolls HARD

Not pure evil but territorial. Hate all man-made things. Reproduce by spraying prey with tiny digging grubs that pierce the skin.

name: Brain Horror
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Rolls:** +3 ALL ROLLS
**Actions:**
- **Stinging Tentacles:** WEAPON, Poisonous (take damage until successful CON Check)
- **Levitate:** Always in flight, can rise up to FAR height, silent
- **Betrayal (INT Spell):** All NEAR enemies make INT Check or turn against an ally for 1 ROUND
- **Psychic Blast (INT Spell):** Single target, any range, ULTIMATE, compels target to walk toward the Brain Horror for 1 turn
- **Feed (INT Spell):** CLOSE, single target, do MAGIC against touched enemy, heal that HP

Construct of a mad sorcerer in forgotten times. Tormented thing, unable to communicate except through dark visions.

name: Carrion Crab
stat_block:
**HP:** 3 Hearts (30 HP)
**Rolls:** +2 ALL ROLLS, 2 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Giant Claws:** WEAPON, CLOSE
- **Dig In:** Pulls legs inward and grips the ground. Utterly immovable by any physical means
- **Passive Spines and Spikes:** Covered in armor, swords, and spears. Any successful melee attack against them inflicts WEAPON Damage on the attacker

Battlefield prowlers that feed on the dead, leather belts, horse flesh, and all debris of battle. Stack and arrange equipment of the fallen onto massive shells. Can be looted several times.

name: Cave Roper

- **Grapple:** Single NEAR target can resist with HARD STR roll or be dragged in and held as food
- **Chew:** With no roll, chews on held prey as an action. Victim can use HARD CON check to halve damage

Camouflaged, immovable cavern predators disguised as stalagmites. Thoughtless, hateful things dwelling in large colonies. Also known as 'Miner's Bane' or 'Cave Chewer.'

name: Child of Azatoth
stat_block:

- **Spell Eater:** Destroy any INT spell used by opponents, removing it from the caster's memory
- **Telekinesis:** Move objects, even huge ones, with INT check. Objects are its only physical weapons
- **Memory Eater (INT Spell):** Targets single victim and robs them of one key memory
- **Aura of Offerings:** Any CLOSE creature must make CHA check. If failed, must offer one LOOT as tribute

Neither living creature nor inanimate statue. An effigy of the unseen horrors that predate the universe.

- **Lash:** Sharp claw weapon
- **Climb:** MOVE actions on any surface

Sword eaters! Stone chewers! Dwarves' bane! Deep-dwellers that devour all metal, refined stone, wood, glass, gems, and artificially honed material. Move in large numbers.

- **Mandibles:** WEAPON, target rolls competing STR check or is restrained by huge jaws

- **Psionic Call:** After first round of combat, vibrates antennae. 1D4 more worms answer in 1D4 ROUNDS

Massive tunneling arthropods that eat crystal. Spotted by their glowing eyes. Hate intruders and patrol their hives day and night.

- **Smoke Walk:** Move between any smoke as a MOVE. Smoke heals them with MAGIC
- **True Name:** If a demon's true name is learned, it can be commanded

Take myriad forms but abide by ancient laws. Intelligent but lack mercy, remorse, or comprehension of redemption. Live in constant rage, pain, and misguided wrath.

Sentient gas or microparticles that move with intelligent motion regardless of wind. Wherever gas or air can go, it can go. Cannot be destroyed but dissipates in time. An immense cloud can destroy an entire city.

name: Direhorn

Huge animals reigning supreme on great plains and steppes. Bigger than a wagon, faster than any horse. No tolerance for two-legged races.

  1. Death Ray: Drops target to 0 HP
  2. Magic Nullifier: Target can't use MAGIC for 1D4 ROUNDS
  3. Energy Fist: WEAPON damage, shove target away until impacting solid surface
  4. Gaze of Stone: Petrify for 1D6 hours. If statue is left behind, effect is permanent

Dreaded rulers of the underworld. Highly intelligent, construct strongholds below. Enslave other monsters, devise devious lures, plan multi-dimensional doomsday schemes.

name: Feeder
stat_block:

- **Chew:** A WEAPON attack

Live only to serve their lord, even unto death. Hard to tell if they are beasts or supernatural things.

Mastermind complex schemes and world-ending plots. No love even for other Fiends. Their feuds are never ending.

Few beings are more ubiquitous in the cosmos. Dwell in volcanic hells, on the surface of suns, and in long-burning forest fires.

**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Rolls:** +2 STATS, +4 MAGIC EFFORT

When the soul of a fallen villain is too hateful to enter the afterworld. If destroyed, reforms in 1D4 hours.

Flying Slimes (Flimes) are primordial life forms driven by hunger alone. Reproduce by division, which can only occur in battle, driving them to fight constantly.

Ravenous, insatiable behemoth from the depths. Devours entire ships. Nature's most terrible creation.

Living souls who lost their lives in sudden, frightful, or heinous tragedy. Anger incarnate, lost and confused. Emit terrible unnatural cold, truly immaterial. Continue to pick at the living until the wrong is undone.

Nasty, fiendish, tribal, semi-sentient rodent-people inhabiting all corners of all worlds. Reproduce like mice or rabbits, infesting places left unchecked.

- **Volcanic Roar:** Column of white hot chemical fire, deafening ULTIMATE ray
- **Bite:** ULTIMATE damage, grappling up to 3 victims
- **Crushing Claw:** ULTIMATE damage NEAR
- **Spell Eater:** Absorb 1 SPELL from a target. Target loses that SPELL

- **Immune to non-MAGIC**

name: Imps

**HP:** Variable
**Rolls:** Variable, Actions Variable

The rats of the nether have laid waste to entire realms with their wanton chaos. Sometimes the small can be mighty. Mighty annoying.

- **Scour:** Anything directly below is totally annihilated. No structure, material, or living thing can survive

- **Regenerate:** Repairs all damage done to it so far

One of the strangest and most colossal beings in the cosmos. A sky-darkening archway or gate made of marble and duranium. As old as the stars. Sweeps entire worlds clean of life.

name: Mainframe
stat_block:
**HP:** Indestructible
**Rolls:** DOES NOT ROLL
**Actions:**
- **Wait:** Becomes inert, silent, dormant

- **Reveal:** All creatures within 1 mile see a vision placed in their minds
- **Vent:** Vents open, hot air jets out. Regenerates any damage taken
- **Doorway:** Cast Doorway, returning to a previous location

Bio-mechanical cubic computers of unknown origin. Purpose unknown, but seem to appear in times of calamity or disaster.

name: Minotaur
stat_block:
**HP:** 3 Hearts (30 HP)

- **Battle Axe:** WEAPON Damage, a huge brutal weapon

- **Cleave:** Bracing and spinning its massive axe, hits all CLOSE enemies with a Weapon attack

Created by elder magic as enslaved guardians, these beasts were once human. The rage in their confused minds drives them wild. Not evil, but simply enraged and bound by powerful spells.

name: Ogre
stat_block:
**HP:** 4 Hearts (40 HP)
**Rolls:** +8 STR, +4 WEAPON, -3 INT, 2 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Spiked Club:** Weapon Damage NEAR reach. Even on a missed Attack, inflicts 3 Damage
- **Body Slam:** Roll DEX or suffer DOUBLE Weapon Damage / immobilized under creature
- **Seismic Hammer:** Seismic area attack. All NEAR enemies must make CON check or be shaken senseless and lose next turn

Somewhere between Hill-men and Giants. Diverse as Goblins. Most known as clumsy, angry, territorial oafs who terrorize travelers to eat their horses.

name: Outsider

**Rolls:** +3 ALL ROLLS, 1 Action per Turn

- **Guns:** Materialize a weapon of choice and fire

- **Membrane:** Creates impervious time-space bubble around an object up to 10 feet across. Inside, time is slowed to a crawl
- **Stasis:** Using gas, paralyze single NEAR target into hypersleep. HARD CON roll to break free
- **Stargate:** Open split-second wormhole to almost any location in the universe

Otherworldly beings with glowing eyes, armored legs and strange hoses. Transfixing and terrifying.

name: Phase Hulk
stat_block:
**HP:** 3 Hearts (30 HP)
**Rolls:** +6 STATS, +3 EFFORT, 2 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Phase Pierce:** Moves through target while momentarily de-phasing. Inflicts MAGIC, knocks victim backward NEAR distance
- **Bite (Material):** In solid form, ULTIMATE attack sprung from behind a target
- **Bite (Phase):** Phasic bite drains STATS. On successful hit, drain 1 point of random STAT
- **Prism Ray:** Dizzying array of colors. Increase current TARGET by 1D4 until killed

Coagulating from pure astral ooze, Phase Hulks feed on any living matter. Driven by hunger more than will of wizards.

name: Primal
stat_block:
**HP:** 4 Hearts (40 HP)
**Rolls:** +4 ALL ROLLS, 2 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **INT Spells:** Ice Missile, Death Nova, Lightning Bolt, Doorway — uses ancient form of magic
- **Force Blast:** Ray of concussive energy with FAR range, ULTIMATE damage
- **Reflect:** Can REFLECT any SPELL, WEAPON attack, or incoming energy AT ANY MOMENT with an INT roll
- **Frozen Touch:** Touch inflicts MAGIC and freezes target in its tracks for 1 ROUND

Originally the workers who enacted the will of creation. Ancient beings now dwindling in number. Fierce will to live refuses to sleep.

name: Razor Pod
stat_block:
**HP:** 4 Hearts (40 HP)
**Rolls:** +8 STATS, +2 EFFORT, 3 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Stinging Grappler:** WEAPON damage and entangling victim with STR
- **Crushing Jaws:** CLOSE. ULTIMATE damage. If bite inflicts 10+, victim is engulfed
- **Flying Nettles:** Cloud of thorns. Creatures within FAR roll DEX or take WEAPON damage
- **Sprout:** If near death, fires a spore pod within FAR, spawning a new Razor Pod with 2 HEARTS

Evil of the Dead Lands has poisoned the plants, filling them with oily slime and deadly hunger. K'Tul fishmen sacrifice captives to these horrors.

name: Rings
stat_block:
**HP:** Indestructible
**Rolls:** +1 ALL ROLLS per Ring
**Actions:**
- **Carve:** Form a boring machine. Carve through 1D100 feet of any solid matter per ROUND
- **Move:** Break apart and reform at new location. Range is DOUBLE FAR
- **Guard:** Barrier of interlocked circlets. Inside, up to 4 humanoid creatures enjoy +10 ARMOR
- **How Many Rings:** Formed of 3D12 rings

The most abstract entity in the multiverse. Made of pure duranium, possibly the first occurrence of that metal. A total mystery.

name: Scarecrow
stat_block:
**HP:** 3 Hearts (30 HP)
**Rolls:** +3 ALL ROLLS
**Actions:**
- **Psychic Insult:** Deepest doubts and darkness exposed. Target rolls CHA or loses next TURN
- **Beacon:** Signals the surrounding area of the heroes' intent
- **Ill News:** Delights in delivering news of doom or darkness. Cackles and taunts, warning of impending death

Durathrax the undying has three known forms: a colossal black dragon, an old hag, and these Scarecrow creatures. Act as her eyes and ears, and harbingers of her destructive arrival.

name: Seraph

**Rolls:** +4 STATS per Arm, 1 Action per Turn per Arm
**Actions:**
- **Energy Cannon:** Each hand opens emitting a ray of ULTIMATE energy
- **Melt:** Pulse of atomic heat liquifies metal objects. Targets roll DEX or lose 1D4 metal LOOT
- **Nova:** All creatures within FAR hit with concussive force. No way to avoid. ULTIMATE damage
- **Kneel:** Speaks in 3-4 word statements. So ominous, all who hear roll CHA or fall to knees for 1D4 ROUNDS

Light energy from dying stars solidified into a living being. Driven by divine purpose: protect the cosmic balance of good and evil at all costs.

name: Shadow Lasher
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Rolls:** +5 DEX, +2 ALL OTHERS, 2 Actions per Turn
**Actions:**
- **Lash:** WEAPON, NEAR reach
- **Pounce:** Leaps onto prey, pinning down with STR
- **Blink:** Move NEAR without passing between locations
- **Vibrating Targets:** Partly in phase, attacks against it are HARD each ROUND until hit once

Lethal, panther-like pack hunters with the ability to phase between locations. Natural beasts with abilities beyond any normal predator.

name: Skeleton
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Rolls:** +1 ALL ROLLS
**Actions:**
- **Stab:** WEAPON. On any critical fail, weapon breaks and must resort to BASIC attacks
- **Death Touch:** Grasps bare skin, burning with cold. MAGIC
- **Slow as Death:** Can never move FAR in an action. Clumsily plods along

The dead are in the employ of haunts and hellions the world over. Devoid of souls, only bone and steel remain. Alone fragile and foolish, but in great numbers a terrifying force.

name: Slime Cube

- **Sticky Acidic Absorption:** Anything besides stone that touches it becomes stuck. In 1D4 ROUNDS, if not escaped, absorbed into interior

- **Loot Within:** Magically protected objects and Chests can survive inside

Silently slide through lairs in timeless, tireless effort to dissolve all debris. Driven by evil magic, totally soulless blobs of acid death.

name: Snake Men

**Actions:**
- **Fire Missile (INT Spell):** Deadly dagger of pure flame, MAGIC
- **Counterspell (INT Spell):** Cunning fighters, confound enemies with crippling strategies
- **Healing Touch (WIS Spell):** Used to heal itself most often, or those fighting for it
- **Howling Hiss:** All who can hear must make CHA roll or be terrified, using entire next TURN running away

Still haunt deep tombs and unholy places, enduring in unlife. Powerful magicians, hoarders of magical knowledge, or seething trap-layers with sadistic plans.

name: Swarm
stat_block:
**HP:** Variable (1-4 Hearts by size)
**Rolls:** NO ROLLS, 1 Action per TURN per HEART
**Actions:**
- **Determining Hearts:** Horse-sized: 1 HEART; wagon: 2; house: 3; bigger: 4 HEARTS
- **Attack:** Descends on targets, compressing to CLOSE range. 1-3 HEARTS: 1D6 damage, 4+ HEARTS: ULTIMATE
- **Baffling Cloud:** Any being within CLOSE makes HARD rolls
- **Disperse and Regroup:** Spread apart and reform anywhere within FAR
- **Proliferate:** Add 1 HEART

Whether cloud of insects or whirl of bats. Only harmed by area effects or attacks.

name: Tentacle
stat_block:

**Rolls:** +4 ALL ROLLS
**Actions:**
- **Lash:** WEAPON, NEAR reach
- **Grapple:** Wraps around single victim, competing STR rolls. Those overcome are squeezed and must roll CON or be winded, losing next turn
- **Drag Down:** Grappled victims pulled into depths. Waggles for 1D4 ROUNDS before doing so
- **Hurl:** If grappled victim is held and Tentacle takes damage, hurls victim to FAR location

Sometimes the pseudopod of a huge Gargoleth, sometimes the conjuration of a mad wizard. Inhuman, elder things existing only to kill.

name: Terror
stat_block:
**HP:** 4 Hearts (40 HP)
